alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 9:31AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of DeSoto, northwestern Marshall, central Tate, southwestern Fayette and southeastern Shelby Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 930 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Downtown Memphis to near Hernando to near Coldwater. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Southaven, Collierville, Germantown, Olive Branch, Horn Lake, Hernando, Senatobia, Cordova, Memphis, Lakeland, Arlington, Coldwater, Byhalia, Southwest Memphis, Ellendale, Lewisburg, Whitehaven, Red Banks and Midtown Memphis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
